name: Scarlet Red Beanie
description:
Hand knitted mohair/wool mix red berry beret/beanie with black mohair crochet flower brooch.

	Size:
Approx circumference: 58cm

	This hat looks small and stretches to fit but I wouldn’t recommend this hat for ‘big heads’ or ‘big hair’!

	The brooch has a bagde safety pin fastening so you can take it off the hat and place it anywhere you like!

	Hand wash only in cold water.

name: Red Red Rose Fairisle Hand Warmers
description: 16 Red Roses with stem and white background gauntlets/handwarmers. Machine knitted and hand finished by me. Due to the fairisle knit please be careful when putting on these gauntlets so not to snag the yarn. Approx. 22cm/8.5 inches long Handwashed to bring out the lovely wooly-ness. Yarn Content: 100% lambswool

name: Pink Heart and Snowflake Handwarmers
description:
Cheeky pink and white cashmere and lambswool gauntlets/handwarmers.

	Machine knitted and hand finished by me.

	Approx.32cm/13inches long

	Handwashed to bring out the lovely wooly-ness.

	Due to the fairisle knit please be careful when putting on these gauntlets so not to snag the yarn.

	Yarn Content:
cashmere and lambswool

	Cold wash only
